Hi Sarah, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://kodilo.com.au/product/alder-taya-sink-mixer/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
done updating the custom field. pls check.

(Time:10mins) @ricaR
@glen I'm done with Change 1, please proceed with Change 2 task. Thanks!

Morning

We do have the specification sheets, install instructions and line drawing pdf on the www.aldertapware.com.au website. We could use the website links from here. We would need to create a document with all links (circa 400 products) to upload.

Do you need URL OR WEBSITE links?

The shipping and warranty is one document and this can be uploaded to media library and added - can you add this functionality ?

Thanks

Sarah

Hi Sarah,

I hope you're doing well.

Just following up to see if you’ve had a chance to review the email Andy sent over. We’re currently waiting on the files mentioned so we can proceed on our end.

Please let us know if you need any assistance or have any questions—we’re here to help.

Looking forward to your response.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Andy Crebar assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Never mind - we need more information before passing to development team anyway.

Greatly appreciate you being his line on defence going forward @ricaR 🙏

Hi Sarah,

Happy Friday!

On #1. confirming we can update the document names. This would be a global update across the site.

Please note, there are no documents currently loaded on that item. If you share these across we can get them updated for you.

On #2. loading PDFs can add significant load to the site and slow down performance, so best practice is to use links to the public link to the PDF saved elsewhere.

Do you have a directory of these PDFs that we could use?

action.text: Andy Crebar assigned to Andy Crebar

full_threads.body: @ricaR - can you take care of the 1st one and @glen can do the second?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Wolf IQ

We would like to make some updates to our website - Kodilo.

Change 1

Please update the Download section shown below, to show the updated document names in the table below the website image.



Downloads
Specification Sheet
Installation Instructions
Shipping, Returns and Warranty
Line Drawing PDF


Change 2

You can not upload documents in the Downloads section below.

Can you please update the functionality to be able to upload documents to shown on the product pages like the example in Change1.


Thank you

Sarah
